Articles.Content:
It's not 100%, dimensions are close... Good enough for government work and a lowly 63 Parts. Potato friendly!

It will misbehave if you let it, it requires finesse. However you are rewarded with overpowered manoeuvrability and the feeling that this truly is a fighter jet. This was more for aesthetics than replicating the performance. Ideally it should use smaller control surfaces but wanted to use the wet wing. For a more realistic thrust level, limit the two turbojets to at least 50%. She's a touch twitchy if you keep her on the ground beyond 40-50m/s at full power. Some weird torque got into it that I cannot seem to fix. It will bite you if you ham-fist it, it will tickle you pink if you caress the controls.

Feel free to use this as a base and improve two areas: The front nose - I'm going crazy trying to figure it out. For now it will have to do. Second: fix that darn torque...

Leave your comments/rep wherever you deem fit.
